attributes.action: make life sentences for rape as the numbers of rape in uk is out of control
attributes.background: rape crisis centers will tell u the real scale of rape we have to act now safe our people make them feel safer from these horrible attacks 1 rape means we have not gone a propper deteriant but nearly half a million  we  need to change law now

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
